text:
MAY 2, 1874.
THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL.
7

BRISTOL.
April 20th. Oscar @ Fredrikstad,—50,230 pcs. boards, Jones & Co. Son. Hulderen @ Fredrikstad,—50,852 pcs. wood.
April 23rd. Eastern Isles (s) @ Bordeaux,—8,730 pit props. Ocean Queen @ Baltimore,—26,255 staves, Jones & Co. Ganger Roef @ Memel,—40 wainscot logs, 272 fir timber, 125 battens, Barnes & Sons.
April 27th. Orion @ Memel, 3,750 staves, Jones & Co. Ganger Roef @ Fredrikstad,—53,698 boards, 3,102 battens, May & Co.

WEST HARTLEPOOL.
April 16th.—Colporteur @ Christiania,—14,660 pcs. props. Nord-havet @ Grimstadt,—2,679 pcs. timber. Kongsbyrd @ Grimstadt,—2,314 pcs. timber, 1,829 pcs. props. Askur @ Mandal,—a full cargo of mining timber. Aglaja @ Brevig,—1,442 pcs. timber, 110 pcs. props. Alert @ Porsgrund,—675 pcs. timber, 447 pcs. poles. Victoria @ Brevig,—4,017 pcs. timber, 394 pcs. poles, 364 pcs. props. Heidrun @ Mandal,—3,344 pcs. props. Hulda @ Gothenburg,—3,857 pcs. mining timber, 2,000 pcs. pit props. Amphitrite @ Fredrikstad,—a cargo of firewood. Thetis @ Stettin,—18,081 pcs. boards, and bdls. laths. Amalthea @ Memel,—934 pcs. timber, 3,102 deals and battens. Thetis @ Stettin,—319 oak logs.
April 17th.—Enigheden @ Christiansoket @ Christiania,—35,897 pcs. pit props. Vestalinden @ Grimstadt,—16,881 pcs. boards, and bdls. laths. Vigen @ Cronstadt,—6,006 pcs. staves, and boards. Wiger @ Cronstadt,—5,068 pcs. deals, and boards. Charlotte @ Stettin,—3,311 pcs. deals, and boards. Louise @ Christiania,—25,897 pcs. pit props. Teddy @ Calmar, 6,326 pcs. props. Fortuna @ Tonsberg,—13,034 pcs. props. Condor @ Chris-tiansand,—a quantity of timber, 558 pcs. props. Hoppet @ Calmar,—7,874 pit props. Jean @ Memel,—695 pcs. timber, 643 pcs. deals, and ends, 20 oak logs. Paul @ Christiansand,—3,412 pcs. timber, 2,878 pcs. props. Ida @ Kongsbacks, —22,650 pcs. props. Fortuna @ Tillingnabben,—5,163 pcs. props. Haabet @ Christiansand,—a quantity of staves. Henriette @ Oscarshamm,—2,065 pcs. props, 1,360 pcs. props. Adolphe @ Carlscrona,—30,759 pcs. props. Ellida @ Tillingnabben,—23,850 pcs. props.
April 18th.—Harriet @ Gefle,—13,800 pcs. deal, battens and boards. Hilma @ Passkallaik,—7,979 pcs. props. Martina @ Uddewalla,—4,328 pcs. props. Martina @ Uddewalla,—20,769 pcs. props. Ellida @ Lillesand,—1,383 pcs. timber, 333 pcs. props. Tordenskjold @ Tillingnabben,—5,863 pcs. pit props. Dagmar @ Mandal,—1,843 pcs. timber, 500 pcs. props. Inga @ Arendal,—538 pcs. timber, 2,608 pcs. mining props. Ilo @ Christiania,—3,884 pcs. props. Marcus Winde @ Monsteras,—765 pcs. props. Henriette @ Dantzic,—195 half round sleepers, 54 pcs. timber, a quantity of lathwood.
April 21st.—Emma @ Dantzic,—816 pcs. round sleepers, 244 pcs. lathwood. Hellas @ Porsgrund,—1,308 pcs. timber, 812 pcs. props. Fredrik Wilhelm @ Dantzic,—397 pcs. timber, 1,368 pcs. props. Friedrich Wilhelm @ Dantzic,—407 pcs. fir timber, 888 pcs. fir timber, a quantity of lathwood. Arnold @ Memel,—a quantity oak staves.
April 22nd.—Talisman @ Dantzic,—407 pcs. oak timber, 10,228 pcs. props. Tre Venner @ Christiania,—15,170 pcs. props.
April 23rd.—Der Friede @ Dantzic,—1,436 pcs. props. Alexander @ Calmar,—14,665 pcs. props. Coral Queen @ Gothenburg,—6,438 bdls. laths, 3,483 pcs. deal battens, 3,903 pcs. lathwood, 13,952 pcs. props.
April 24th.—Johanna @ Westerwick,—14,256 pcs. props, 2,919 pcs. deals and battens, 705 pcs. mining timber. Rapide @ Westerwick, 2,745 pcs. props, 579 pcs. mining timber.
April 25th.—Nil.

April 27th.—Seaton, S. S. @ Riga,—7,923 pcs. square sleepers, 663 pcs. half square sleepers.
April 28th.—William @ Mandal,—2,677 pcs. timber, 2,363 pcs. props.
April 29th.—Heinrich @ Tillingsnabben,—4,911 pcs. props. Thor @ Calmar,—8,149 pcs. props.
GLASGOW.
April 20th. Martha @ Belize,—763 pcs. mahogany, 9 pcs. cedar, 117 tons logwood, 8 pcs. mahogany, 36 1/2 tons rosewood, Wm. Connal & Co.
PORT GLASGOW.
April 14th. Chippewa @ Pensacola,—674 pcs. hewn timber, 94 pcs. sawn timber, 660 pcs. deals, Order.
April 23rd. Morland @ Pensacola,—575 pcs. sawn timber, 351 deals, Order.
GRANGEMOUTH.
April 13th. Mercur @ Dram,—13,640 pcs. battens, R. Melville & Co. Francis @ Dram,—5,922 pcs. battens, W. Kerr & Co. Pauline @ Sannesund,—6,129 pcs. battens, Williamson Bros. Den Gode Hensigt @ Dram,—7,575 pcs. battens, G. T. Salvesen & Co. Oscar @ Dram, —9,380 pcs. battens, Macpherson & McLaren.
April 14th. Ophelia @ Dram,—7,419 pcs. battens, James Brownlee. Sirene @ Memel,—702 pcs. timber, 698 pcs. fir deals, 3,240 pcs. oak staves, Brownlee, Dunn & Co. Maria @ Memel,—554 pcs. oak timber, 605 pcs. deals, 251 pcs. fir timber, 3,790 oak staves, A. Thomson & Nephews. Broderne @ Dram,—12,778 pieces battens, J. T. Salvesen & Co. Herolden @ Christiania,—5,593 battens, A. Thomson & Nephews. Atlas @ Memel,—4,519 deals and ends, Order. May @ Porsgrund,—2,688 pcs. timber, 1,511 pcs. battens, J. T. Salvesen & Co. Christine @ Gothenburg, 10,806 battens, A. Thomson & Nephews. Niels @ Falkenburg, 1,926 deals and battens, Order. Ni Todskende @ Dram, 5,116 battens, J. T. Salvesen & Co. Lessing @ Stettin,—352 pcs. square oak timber, 80 pcs. fir timber, A. Thomson & Nephews.
April 18th. Najaden @ Dram,—6,405 battens, J. T. Salvesen & Co. Trabant @ Danzig,—326 pcs. oak timber, 430 pcs. fir timber, 15 fathoms lathwood, A. Thomson & Nephews. Nexo @ Memel,—3,619 deals, Order. Drache @ Memel,—1,486 deals, Order.
April 21st.—Emily Lowther @ Doboy,—639 pcs. pitch pine timber, 326 pcs. pitch pine deals, A. Thomson & Nephews. Louise Alwardi, @ Memel,—439 pcs. timber, 438 pcs. deals, J. T. Salvesen & Co. Augnste @ Memel,—500 pcs. timber, 573 pcs. deals, 22 pcs. deal ends, 6 fms. lathwood, J. T. Salvesen & Co.
April 22nd. Gustava @ Memel,—3,561 deals, Order.
April 23rd. Familie @ Memel,—221 pcs. fir timber, 165 pcs. oak timber, 1,008 deals, 2 fathoms lathwood, Macpherson & McLaren.
Christina @ Gothenburg,—18,694 battens, Order.
There were also imported during the above period 83,426 pit props and 1,642,404 fir staves.

LEITH.
April 15th. Antina @ Mandal,—30,000 fir staves, Order. Haabet @ Porsgrund,—4,800 battens, Mitchell, Somerville, & Co.
April 17th. Violet @ Porsgrund,—7,272 battens, R. Park & Co.
April 18th. Yelva @ Dram,—7,253 battens, Mitchell, Somerville, & Co. Hoffnung @ Windau,—253 pcs. timber, 2,000 deals and ends, R. Park & Co.
April 21st. Laurvig @ Dram,—6,015 battens, Mitchell, Somerville, & Co.
April 22nd. Columbus @ Flekkiefiord,—120,000 fir staves, Mitchell, Somerville, & Co.
April 24th. Stirling @ Riga,—30 loads lathwood, Order. Constan-tine @ Fredrikstad,—12,257 battens, Hutchinson & Rogers.
April 27th. Oscar @ Fredrikstad,—9,172 battens, Ferguson, David-son, & Co. Delphin @ Tonsberg,—4,925 pit props, Lacour & Watson.
ST. DAVIDS.
April 17th. Marie @ Harburg,—2,050 props, Robert Cairn.
QUEENSFERRY.
April 14th. Klintenberg @ Moss,—7,958 props, Williamson Brothers.
April 20th. Oscar @ Laurvig,—6,975 props, Williamson Brothers.
BO'NESS.
April 14th. Sangvid @ Christiansand,—3,600 props, J. Denholm. Andrea @ Christiania,—4,946 props, J. T. Salvesen & Co. Proven @ Falkenburg,—8,304 props, Love & Stewart. Bore @ Christiansand,—6,000 props, J. Denholm.
April 15th. Fire Venner @ Christiansand,—4,000 props, J. Den-holm. Bernhardina @ Uddewalla,—18,372 props, Love & Stewart. Oscar @ Falkenburg,—11,266 props, Love & Stewart. Ceres @ Fal-kenburg,—10,266 props, Love & Stewart.
April 17th. St. Johannes @ Tonsberg,—160 loads props. M. J. Ellingsen. Bien @ Hamburg,—190 loads props, Order. Elizabeth @ Christiania,—158 loads props, Love & Stewart. Harald @ Falkenburg, —11,263 props, Love & Stewart. Newcastle Packet @ Christiansand, —3,000 props, 18,000 fir staves, J. Denholm. Victor @ Mandal,—3,413 props, J. Denholm.
April 18th. Frollhallen @ Moss,—5,683 props, W. Donaldson
April 20th. Athene @ Falkenburg,—7,745 props, Love & Stewart.
